lines.text: Czy jak powierzysz tajemnice nie wyśpiewa jak Sampha
lines.translation: If you tell him your secrets, won't he sing like Sampha?
lines.grammar: Verbs: powierzysz (prefix po- hints perfective/directional) (present 2sg). Prepositions/case: Check cases after preps (do+gen, z+gen, na/w for motion vs location).. Meaning: 'If you tell him your secrets, won't he sing like Sampha?'. Explain how aspect/prefix changes meaning and how case follows these prepositions.

lines.text: Gdy się zacznie wycofywać, niech zapali się lampka
lines.translation: When he starts to retreat, let the light go on
lines.grammar: Verbs: się (1sg ending -ę); wycofywać (prefix wy- hints perfective/directional). Prepositions/case: Check cases after preps (do+gen, z+gen, na/w for motion vs location).. Meaning: 'When he starts to retreat, let the light go on'. Explain how aspect/prefix changes meaning and how case follows these prepositions.

lines.text: Zasada siódma — pamiętaj, branża bywa okrutna
lines.translation: Rule Seven - Remember, the industry can be cruel
lines.grammar: Verbs: Find the main verb and note its aspect (perfective vs imperfective).. Prepositions/case: Check cases after preps (do+gen, z+gen, na/w for motion vs location).. Meaning: 'Rule Seven - Remember, the industry can be cruel'. Explain how aspect/prefix changes meaning and how case follows these prepositions.

lines.text: Czasami przyjaźń jest piękna, czasami przyjaźń jest złudna
lines.translation: Sometimes friendship is beautiful, sometimes friendship is illusory
lines.grammar: Verbs: Find the main verb and note its aspect (perfective vs imperfective).. Prepositions/case: Check cases after preps (do+gen, z+gen, na/w for motion vs location).. Meaning: 'Sometimes friendship is beautiful, sometimes friendship is illusory'. Explain how aspect/prefix changes meaning and how case follows these prepositions.

lines.text: Nie warto wsadzać wszystkich naraz do tego samego pudła
lines.translation: It's not worth putting everyone in the same box at once.
lines.grammar: Verbs: wsadzać (prefix w- hints perfective/directional). Prepositions/case: do + genitive for motion toward. Meaning: 'It's not worth putting everyone in the same box at once.'. Explain how aspect/prefix changes meaning and how case follows these prepositions.

lines.text: Nie każdy day one jest złotem, nie każdy obcy to kurwa
lines.translation: Not every day one is gold, not every stranger is a whore
lines.grammar: Verbs: złotem (prefix z- hints perfective/directional) (present 1sg). Prepositions/case: Check cases after preps (do+gen, z+gen, na/w for motion vs location).. Meaning: 'Not every day one is gold, not every stranger is a whore'. Explain how aspect/prefix changes meaning and how case follows these prepositions.
